üì© Sign up for flood warnings https://t.co/3dFGnmi8Bn‚Ä¶

üîé‚Ä¶

@mikewporter @wheat_daddy @pastoralview @Drystonesonnet @agricontract @EnvAgency @westyeo @Suff_highways That's a coincidence you say this Mike.. Council have just done surface water grips on Sunk this past week. Picture later when i go out.
RT @EnvAgencySE: We have put up temporary barriers up in South Hinksey and they are working well. https://t.co/WPWRNWkE5L
RT @mikewporter: @sunkfarmer @wheat_daddy @pastoralview @Drystonesonnet @agricontract @EnvAgency @westyeo All public roads used to have the‚Ä¶

@sunkfarmer @wheat_daddy @pastoralview @Drystonesonnet @agricontract @EnvAgency @westyeo All public roads used to have the gullies cleaned every year but it does not happen now. Lack of maintenance causes major problems and expense later. @Suff_highways

@WorcsTravel @stwater @worcscc @EnvAgencyMids @Wychavon Take care - you cannot divert up Fladbury Hill and Hill Furze to avoid A44 closure through road closed - verge now deep mud and Sherrifs Lench blocked with large lorry across road in ditch.

@wheat_daddy @pastoralview @Drystonesonnet @agricontract @EnvAgency @westyeo My farm ditches being cleaned out last Thursday, we do these annually without fail, vitally important to keep land dry.. #keepwaterflowing https://t.co/CxbopvhlZG

Hi @EnvAgencySE do you look after the facilities on the Thames at Windsor? The water point there has been damaged and leaks pretty badly when in use. We‚Äôre in lockdown here and concerned it might stop working altogether soon.

text: @wheat_daddy @pastoralview @Drystonesonnet @agricontract @EnvAgency @westyeo And tide marks 7ft up the tree trunks. Was just a deadly silence of wildlife carnage

text:
RT @LDNWaterkeeper: Homes polluted by sewage from Mogden Sewage Works, overwhelmed by rain? What's the latest?
@DefraGovUK @Ofwat @ZacGolds‚Ä¶
RT @chalmers_m: #FieldTeams have been out again today clearing screens and checking our #CriticalAssets in #Warwickshire. Video taken by Da‚Ä¶
@EnvAgencySW https://t.co/dBlARphDaB
@EnvAgency
RT @wheat_daddy: @sunkfarmer @pastoralview @Drystonesonnet @agricontract @EnvAgency @westyeo I remember going in the spring soon after all‚Ä¶
@Markjhatton @wheat_daddy @pastoralview @agricontract @EnvAgency @westyeo When it fills up to the top.

@sunkfarmer @pastoralview @Drystonesonnet @agricontract @EnvAgency @westyeo I remember going in the spring soon after all the water had gone, the bushes and trees were full of debris and there was not one bird singing or a rabbit or hare running around, terrible. There will always be far more wildlife perish after a flood than with river maintenance. https://t.co/FldS94gsUs

Whatever happens it would be better if it was done in a considered way with a public debate. I might have missed the public debate but I haven‚Äôt seen anything from @EnvAgencySW  or @EnvAgency so far. https://t.co/ZF4TrPiesg
@wheat_daddy @pastoralview @Drystonesonnet @agricontract @EnvAgency @westyeo How silted up does a ditch need to before ditch no longer a ditch?
RT @PhilipsWriting: @campbellar @EnvAgency @EnvAgencySW Agree with all you say and I have tried to get answers.  It feels to me like the wo‚Ä¶
RT @ThamesPathNT: Flood WARNINGS on the River #Thames issued by @EnvAgencySE on #Sunday morning, especially #Dorchester to #Goring, #Purley‚Ä¶

@MaddeverAndrew @EnvAgency Thanks Andrew. I can see that it's been a recurring issue and I've raised this again under job number 58508936. We'll get a technician out there asap today to get that sorted, Thanks for taking the time to report this to us. Kate
@pastoralview @wheat_daddy @Drystonesonnet @agricontract @EnvAgency @westyeo Well said. Whoever decides its the right thing to build on flood plains doesn't have a brain.

@wheat_daddy @pastoralview @Drystonesonnet @agricontract @EnvAgency @westyeo Ah but if the water levels get to high the water voles and other wildlife simply die of drowning. Memory goes to Somerset during the floods and seeing so much wildlife floating around you were there too Wardy and like me i guess you'd have found it fairly depressing.
RT @Drystonesonnet: @wheat_daddy @pastoralview @agricontract @EnvAgency @westyeo Yes. Basically, dredging like that makes a lot of voles ho‚Ä¶

@wheat_daddy @Drystonesonnet @pastoralview @agricontract @EnvAgency @westyeo Why do you think watervoles are declining?  Development.  Unwise methods of producing food, favouring polluting business.  A Land for for wvs Is also Better 4 u.
@AnglianWater @EnvAgency Been happening for years
RT @HeritageFundNOR: The NP11 Northern group of Local Enterprise Partnerships in collaboration with @HeritageFundUK, @ace_national, @EnvAge‚Ä¶
RT @Drystonesonnet: @wheat_daddy @pastoralview @agricontract @EnvAgency @westyeo Yes. Basically, dredging like that makes a lot of voles ho‚Ä¶
@wheat_daddy @Drystonesonnet @agricontract @EnvAgency @westyeo You're right there + they seem to be building on flood plains which is going to cause problems further down the line.
RT @wheat_daddy: @pastoralview @Drystonesonnet @agricontract @EnvAgency @westyeo This needs doing in so many parts of the country but more‚Ä¶
@AnglianWater @EnvAgency It‚Äôs the Whepstead pumping station at the bottom of Church Hill, I‚Äôm very surprised you are not aware. It‚Äôs fine in for YEARS.

@wheat_daddy @pastoralview @agricontract @EnvAgency @westyeo Yes. Basically, dredging like that makes a lot of voles homeless, but they will recover as the grass grows again.

But I am pretty sure that we could design ways of helping water voles over the sparse period after dredging.
RT @wheat_daddy: @pastoralview @Drystonesonnet @agricontract @EnvAgency @westyeo This needs doing in so many parts of the country but more‚Ä¶

@MaddeverAndrew @EnvAgency Morning Andrew. I'm sorry to see that this is happening. Could you let me know where this is please and I'll check to make sure a job has been raised and, if not, get that raised immediately. If you would prefer to DM me please feel free to do so. Thanks, Kate https://t.co/y94x1oGRLL

RT @EnvAgencyMids: The #RiverAvon at #Evesham peaked at 03.24 this morning

#Flood warnings remain in place all over the #Midlands so make‚Ä¶

@AnglianWater I thought you might like to have a look at this regular issue. It had been reported numerous times over the last few years. I guess pollution is a massive issue when it‚Äôs someone else‚Äôs pollution.@EnvAgency https://t.co/B2i1hn49uE

@pastoralview @Drystonesonnet @agricontract @EnvAgency @westyeo This needs doing in so many parts of the country but more emphasis is put on preserving water voles homes than peoples homes, businesses and food production.

RT @EnvAgency: #WasteCrime harms our environment, community and economy.
 
We joined forces with partners to form the Joint Unit for Waste‚Ä¶

@agricontract @EnvAgency Excellent
